[30;1m35 | [0m[35m            node.value.value = self.value()[0m
[30;1m36 | [0m[35m        return node[0m

[30;1m39 | [0m[35m        return len(self._versions) == 1[0m
[30;1m40 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m578 | [0m[35m    headers = {"Forwarded": "for=test;b0rked;secret=mySecret;proto=wss"}[0m
[30;1m579 | [0m[35m    request, response = app.test_client.get("/", headers=headers)[0m

[30;1m581 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m582 | [0m[35m    # Unexpected termination should not lose existing acceptable values[0m
